TEXT.FORM: paʁ ɯ-jo nɯnɯ, paχtsa ri, paχtsa ri mɤ-kɯ-ʑɯ tu-kɯ-wxti tsa, paʁ kɤ-skɤɣ ri mɤ-kɯ-rtaʁ kɯ-fse paʁ ɯ-jo tu-kɯ-ti ŋu. tɕe nɯnɯ, nɯfse ʑo paχtsa nɯ, paχtsa tɕi tu-kɯ-ti khɯ ri, paχtsa wuma kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi kɯ-maʁ, tɯ-wxti tu-kɯ-ʑa jamar, kɤ-skɤɣ ri mɤ-kɯ-rtaʁ kɯ-fse, nɯnɯ tɕe paʁ ɯ-jo tu-kɯ-ti ŋu. ==== tɤ-sci ɯ-qhu lɤβdelɤŋu-sla jamar tɤ-kɯ-tsu nɯ paʁ ɯ-jo tu-kɯ-ti ŋu.
